charges.charge_description: 18:922(g) Unlawfully Possed Firearms That in Traveled Interstate Commerce

charges.charge_disposition: IMPRISONMENT for a total term of 180 months as to count 1 and 60 months as to count 2 to run consecutive to count 1, for a total term of 240 months; SUPERVISED RELEASE for a term of 5 years as to counts 1 and 2 to run concurrent; ASSESSMENT in the amount of $200.00

charges.charge_offence_description: 18:922(g) Unlawfully Possed Firearms That in Trave

charges.charge_description: 18:922(g) FELON IN POSSESSION; 18:2 AIDING AND ABETTING(1)

charges.charge_disposition: IMPRISONMENT for a total term of 180 months as to count 1 and 60 months as to count 2 to run consecutive to count 1, for a total term of 240 months; SUPERVISED RELEASE for a term of 5 years as to counts 1 and 2 to run concurrent; ASSESSMENT in the amount of $200.00

charges.charge_description: 18:924(c) POSSESSION OF A FIREARM IN FURTHERANCE OF DRUG TRAFFICKING; 18:2 AIDING AND ABETTING(2)

charges.charge_disposition: IMPRISONMENT for a total term of 180 months as to count 1 and 60 months as to count 2 to run consecutive to count 1, for a total term of 240 months; SUPERVISED RELEASE for a term of 5 years as to counts 1 and 2 to run concurrent; ASSESSMENT in the amount of $200.00
